/*
0000_0000_0000_0001 // ADD R0<=R0+R1  
0001_0001_0000_0001 // SUB R1<=R0-R1 
0010_0010_0000_0001 // AND R2<=R0&R1
0011_0010_0000_0001 // OR R2<=R0|R1
0100_0010_0000_0001 // XOR R2<=R0^R1 
0101_0000_0000_0001 // INV R0
0110_0000_0001_0001 // SHL R0<<R1
0111_0001_0000_0000 // MOV R1<=R0
1000_0001_0000_0101 // LDI R1<=05
1001_0000_0000_0001 // JZ label
1010_0000_0000_0001 // INC R0
1011_0000_0000_0001 // DEC R0 
1100_0001_0000_0001 // HLT
1101_0000_0000_0001 // JC label
1110_0001_0000_0011 // JNZ R1,abvline
1111_0000_0000_0010 // JMP 

--pending..
LDM R0  0000_1000_0000_1000
STM R0  0001_1000_0000_1000
*/

/*
0000_0000_0000_0001 // ADD R0<=R0+R1  
0000_0000_0000_0010 // ADD R0<=R0+R2
0000_0000_0000_0011 // ADD R0<=R0+R3
0000_0000_0001_0000 // ADD R0<=R1+R0
0000_0000_0001_0010 // ADD R0<=R1+R2
0000_0000_0001_0011 // ADD R0<=R1+R3 
0000_0000_0010_0000 // ADD R0<=R2+R0
0000_0000_0010_0001 // ADD R0<=R2+R1  
0000_0000_0010_0011 // ADD R0<=R2+R3
0000_0000_0011_0000 // ADD R0<=R3+R0
0000_0000_0011_0001 // ADD R0<=R3+R1 
0000_0000_0011_0010 // ADD R0<=R3+R2 

0000_0001_0000_0001 // ADD R1<=R0+R1  
0000_0001_0000_0010 // ADD R1<=R0+R2
0000_0001_0000_0011 // ADD R1<=R0+R3
0000_0001_0001_0000 // ADD R1<=R1+R0
0000_0001_0001_0010 // ADD R1<=R1+R2
0000_0001_0001_0011 // ADD R1<=R1+R3 
0000_0001_0010_0000 // ADD R1<=R2+R0
0000_0001_0010_0001 // ADD R1<=R2+R1  
0000_0001_0010_0011 // ADD R1<=R2+R3
0000_0001_0011_0000 // ADD R1<=R3+R0
0000_0001_0011_0001 // ADD R1<=R3+R1 
0000_0001_0011_0010 // ADD R1<=R3+R2 

0000_0010_0000_0001 // ADD R2<=R0+R1  
0000_0010_0000_0010 // ADD R2<=R0+R2
0000_0010_0000_0011 // ADD R2<=R0+R3
0000_0010_0001_0000 // ADD R2<=R1+R0
0000_0010_0001_0010 // ADD R2<=R1+R2
0000_0010_0001_0011 // ADD R2<=R1+R3 
0000_0010_0010_0000 // ADD R2<=R2+R0
0000_0010_0010_0001 // ADD R2<=R2+R1  
0000_0010_0010_0011 // ADD R2<=R2+R3
0000_0010_0011_0000 // ADD R2<=R3+R0
0000_0010_0011_0001 // ADD R2<=R3+R1 
0000_0010_0011_0010 // ADD R2<=R3+R2 

0000_0011_0000_0001 // ADD R3<=R0+R1  
0000_0011_0000_0010 // ADD R3<=R0+R2
0000_0011_0000_0011 // ADD R3<=R0+R3
0000_0011_0001_0000 // ADD R3<=R1+R0
0000_0011_0001_0010 // ADD R3<=R1+R2
0000_0011_0001_0011 // ADD R3<=R1+R3 
0000_0011_0010_0000 // ADD R3<=R2+R0
0000_0011_0010_0001 // ADD R3<=R2+R1  
0000_0011_0010_0011 // ADD R3<=R2+R3
0000_0011_0011_0000 // ADD R3<=R3+R0
0000_0011_0011_0001 // ADD R3<=R3+R1 
0000_0011_0011_0010 // ADD R3<=R3+R2 



0001_0000_0000_0001 // SUB R0<=R0+R1  
0001_0000_0000_0010 // SUB R0<=R0+R2
0001_0000_0000_0011 // SUB R0<=R0+R3
0001_0000_0001_0000 // SUB R0<=R1+R0
0001_0000_0001_0010 // SUB R0<=R1+R2
0001_0000_0001_0011 // SUB R0<=R1+R3 
0001_0000_0010_0000 // SUB R0<=R2+R0
0001_0000_0010_0001 // SUB R0<=R2+R1  
0001_0000_0010_0011 // SUB R0<=R2+R3
0001_0000_0011_0000 // SUB R0<=R3+R0
0001_0000_0011_0001 // SUB R0<=R3+R1 
0001_0000_0011_0010 // SUB R0<=R3+R2 

0001_0001_0000_0001 // SUB R1<=R0+R1  
0001_0001_0000_0010 // SUB R1<=R0+R2
0001_0001_0000_0011 // SUB R1<=R0+R3
0001_0001_0001_0000 // SUB R1<=R1+R0
0001_0001_0001_0010 // SUB R1<=R1+R2
0001_0001_0001_0011 // SUB R1<=R1+R3 
0001_0001_0010_0000 // SUB R1<=R2+R0
0001_0001_0010_0001 // SUB R1<=R2+R1  
0001_0001_0010_0011 // SUB R1<=R2+R3
0001_0001_0011_0000 // SUB R1<=R3+R0
0001_0001_0011_0001 // SUB R1<=R3+R1 
0001_0001_0011_0010 // SUB R1<=R3+R2 

0001_0010_0000_0001 // SUB R2<=R0+R1  
0001_0010_0000_0010 // SUB R2<=R0+R2
0001_0010_0000_0011 // SUB R2<=R0+R3
0001_0010_0001_0000 // SUB R2<=R1+R0
0001_0010_0001_0010 // SUB R2<=R1+R2
0001_0010_0001_0011 // SUB R2<=R1+R3 
0001_0010_0010_0000 // SUB R2<=R2+R0
0001_0010_0010_0001 // SUB R2<=R2+R1  
0001_0010_0010_0011 // SUB R2<=R2+R3
0001_0010_0011_0000 // SUB R2<=R3+R0
0001_0010_0011_0001 // SUB R2<=R3+R1 
0001_0010_0011_0010 // SUB R2<=R3+R2 

0001_0011_0000_0001 // SUB R3<=R0+R1  
0001_0011_0000_0010 // SUB R3<=R0+R2
0001_0011_0000_0011 // SUB R3<=R0+R3
0001_0011_0001_0000 // SUB R3<=R1+R0
0001_0011_0001_0010 // SUB R3<=R1+R2
0001_0011_0001_0011 // SUB R3<=R1+R3 
0001_0011_0010_0000 // SUB R3<=R2+R0
0001_0011_0010_0001 // SUB R3<=R2+R1  
0001_0011_0010_0011 // SUB R3<=R2+R3
0001_0011_0011_0000 // SUB R3<=R3+R0
0001_0011_0011_0001 // SUB R3<=R3+R1 
0001_0011_0011_0010 // SUB R3<=R3+R2 



0100_0000_0000_0001 // XOR R0<=R0+R1  
0100_0000_0000_0010 // XOR R0<=R0+R2
0100_0000_0000_0011 // XOR R0<=R0+R3
0100_0000_0001_0000 // XOR R0<=R1+R0
0100_0000_0001_0010 // XOR R0<=R1+R2
0100_0000_0001_0011 // XOR R0<=R1+R3 
0100_0000_0010_0000 // XOR R0<=R2+R0
0100_0000_0010_0001 // XOR R0<=R2+R1  
0100_0000_0010_0011 // XOR R0<=R2+R3
0100_0000_0011_0000 // XOR R0<=R3+R0
0100_0000_0011_0001 // XOR R0<=R3+R1 
0100_0000_0011_0010 // XOR R0<=R3+R2 

0100_0001_0000_0001 // XOR R1<=R0+R1  
0100_0001_0000_0010 // XOR R1<=R0+R2
0100_0001_0000_0011 // XOR R1<=R0+R3
0100_0001_0001_0000 // XOR R1<=R1+R0
0100_0001_0001_0010 // XOR R1<=R1+R2
0100_0001_0001_0011 // XOR R1<=R1+R3 
0100_0001_0010_0000 // XOR R1<=R2+R0
0100_0001_0010_0001 // XOR R1<=R2+R1  
0100_0001_0010_0011 // XOR R1<=R2+R3
0100_0001_0011_0000 // XOR R1<=R3+R0
0100_0001_0011_0001 // XOR R1<=R3+R1 
0100_0001_0011_0010 // XOR R1<=R3+R2 

0100_0010_0000_0001 // XOR R2<=R0+R1  
0100_0010_0000_0010 // XOR R2<=R0+R2
0100_0010_0000_0011 // XOR R2<=R0+R3
0100_0010_0001_0000 // XOR R2<=R1+R0
0100_0010_0001_0010 // XOR R2<=R1+R2
0100_0010_0001_0011 // XOR R2<=R1+R3 
0100_0010_0010_0000 // XOR R2<=R2+R0
0100_0010_0010_0001 // XOR R2<=R2+R1  
0100_0010_0010_0011 // XOR R2<=R2+R3
0100_0010_0011_0000 // XOR R2<=R3+R0
0100_0010_0011_0001 // XOR R2<=R3+R1 
0100_0010_0011_0010 // XOR R2<=R3+R2 

0001_0011_0000_0001 // XOR R3<=R0+R1  
0001_0011_0000_0010 // XOR R3<=R0+R2
0001_0011_0000_0011 // XOR R3<=R0+R3
0001_0011_0001_0000 // XOR R3<=R1+R0
0001_0011_0001_0010 // XOR R3<=R1+R2
0001_0011_0001_0011 // XOR R3<=R1+R3 
0001_0011_0010_0000 // XOR R3<=R2+R0
0001_0011_0010_0001 // XOR R3<=R2+R1  
0001_0011_0010_0011 // XOR R3<=R2+R3
0001_0011_0011_0000 // XOR R3<=R3+R0
0001_0011_0011_0001 // XOR R3<=R3+R1 
0001_0011_0011_0010 // XOR R3<=R3+R2 

0011_0000_0000_0001 // OR R0<=R0+R1  
0011_0000_0000_0010 // OR R0<=R0+R2
0011_0000_0000_0011 // OR R0<=R0+R3
0011_0000_0001_0000 // OR R0<=R1+R0
0011_0000_0001_0010 // OR R0<=R1+R2
0011_0000_0001_0011 // OR R0<=R1+R3 
0011_0000_0010_0000 // OR R0<=R2+R0
0011_0000_0010_0001 // OR R0<=R2+R1  
0011_0000_0010_0011 // OR R0<=R2+R3
0011_0000_0011_0000 // OR R0<=R3+R0
0011_0000_0011_0001 // OR R0<=R3+R1 
0011_0000_0011_0010 // OR R0<=R3+R2 

0011_0001_0000_0001 // OR R1<=R0+R1  
0011_0001_0000_0010 // OR R1<=R0+R2
0011_0001_0000_0011 // OR R1<=R0+R3
0011_0001_0001_0000 // OR R1<=R1+R0
0011_0001_0001_0010 // OR R1<=R1+R2
0011_0001_0001_0011 // OR R1<=R1+R3 
0011_0001_0010_0000 // OR R1<=R2+R0
0011_0001_0010_0001 // OR R1<=R2+R1  
0011_0001_0010_0011 // OR R1<=R2+R3
0011_0001_0011_0000 // OR R1<=R3+R0
0011_0001_0011_0001 // OR R1<=R3+R1 
0011_0001_0011_0010 // OR R1<=R3+R2 

0011_0010_0000_0001 // OR R2<=R0+R1  
0011_0010_0000_0010 // OR R2<=R0+R2
0011_0010_0000_0011 // OR R2<=R0+R3
0011_0010_0001_0000 // OR R2<=R1+R0
0011_0010_0001_0010 // OR R2<=R1+R2
0011_0010_0001_0011 // OR R2<=R1+R3 
0011_0010_0010_0000 // OR R2<=R2+R0
0011_0010_0010_0001 // OR R2<=R2+R1  
0011_0010_0010_0011 // OR R2<=R2+R3
0011_0010_0011_0000 // OR R2<=R3+R0
0011_0010_0011_0001 // OR R2<=R3+R1 
0011_0010_0011_0010 // OR R2<=R3+R2 

0011_0011_0000_0001 // OR R3<=R0+R1  
0011_0011_0000_0010 // OR R3<=R0+R2
0011_0011_0000_0011 // OR R3<=R0+R3
0011_0011_0001_0000 // OR R3<=R1+R0
0011_0011_0001_0010 // OR R3<=R1+R2
0011_0011_0001_0011 // OR R3<=R1+R3 
0011_0011_0010_0000 // OR R3<=R2+R0
0011_0011_0010_0001 // OR R3<=R2+R1  
0011_0011_0010_0011 // OR R3<=R2+R3
0011_0011_0011_0000 // OR R3<=R3+R0
0011_0011_0011_0001 // OR R3<=R3+R1 
0011_0011_0011_0010 // OR R3<=R3+R2 



0010_0000_0000_0001 // AND R0<=R0+R1  
0010_0000_0000_0010 // AND R0<=R0+R2
0010_0000_0000_0011 // AND R0<=R0+R3
0010_0000_0001_0000 // AND R0<=R1+R0
0010_0000_0001_0010 // AND R0<=R1+R2
0010_0000_0001_0011 // AND R0<=R1+R3 
0010_0000_0010_0000 // AND R0<=R2+R0
0010_0000_0010_0001 // AND R0<=R2+R1  
0010_0000_0010_0011 // AND R0<=R2+R3
0010_0000_0011_0000 // AND R0<=R3+R0
0010_0000_0011_0001 // AND R0<=R3+R1 
0010_0000_0011_0010 // AND R0<=R3+R2 

0010_0001_0000_0001 // AND R1<=R0+R1  
0010_0001_0000_0010 // AND R1<=R0+R2
0010_0001_0000_0011 // AND R1<=R0+R3
0010_0001_0001_0000 // AND R1<=R1+R0
0010_0001_0001_0010 // AND R1<=R1+R2
0010_0001_0001_0011 // AND R1<=R1+R3 
0010_0001_0010_0000 // AND R1<=R2+R0
0010_0001_0010_0001 // AND R1<=R2+R1  
0010_0001_0010_0011 // AND R1<=R2+R3
0010_0001_0011_0000 // AND R1<=R3+R0
0010_0001_0011_0001 // AND R1<=R3+R1 
0010_0001_0011_0010 // AND R1<=R3+R2 

0010_0010_0000_0001 // AND R2<=R0+R1  
0010_0010_0000_0010 // AND R2<=R0+R2
0010_0010_0000_0011 // AND R2<=R0+R3
0010_0010_0001_0000 // AND R2<=R1+R0
0010_0010_0001_0010 // AND R2<=R1+R2
0010_0010_0001_0011 // AND R2<=R1+R3 
0010_0010_0010_0000 // AND R2<=R2+R0
0010_0010_0010_0001 // AND R2<=R2+R1  
0010_0010_0010_0011 // AND R2<=R2+R3
0010_0010_0011_0000 // AND R2<=R3+R0
0010_0010_0011_0001 // AND R2<=R3+R1 
0010_0010_0011_0010 // AND R2<=R3+R2 

0010_0011_0000_0001 // AND R3<=R0+R1  
0010_0011_0000_0010 // AND R3<=R0+R2
0010_0011_0000_0011 // AND R3<=R0+R3
0010_0011_0001_0000 // AND R3<=R1+R0
0010_0011_0001_0010 // AND R3<=R1+R2
0010_0011_0001_0011 // AND R3<=R1+R3 
0010_0011_0010_0000 // AND R3<=R2+R0
0010_0011_0010_0001 // AND R3<=R2+R1  
0010_0011_0010_0011 // AND R3<=R2+R3
0010_0011_0011_0000 // AND R3<=R3+R0
0010_0011_0011_0001 // AND R3<=R3+R1 
0010_0011_0011_0010 // AND R3<=R3+R2 


0101_0000_0000_0001 // INV R0
0101_0001_0000_0001 // INV R1
0101_0010_0000_0001 // INV R2
0101_0011_0000_0001 // INV R3

1010_0000_0000_0001 // INC R0
1010_0001_0000_0001 // INC R1
1010_0010_0000_0001 // INC R2
1010_0011_0000_0001 // INC R3

1011_0000_0000_0001 // DEC R0 
1011_0001_0000_0001 // DEC R1
1011_0010_0000_0001 // DEC R2
1011_0011_0000_0001 // DEC R3


0110_0000_0001_0001 // SHL R0<<R1
0110_0000_0010_0001 // SHL R0<<R2
0110_0000_0011_0001 // SHL R0<<R3
0110_0001_0000_0001 // SHL R1<<R0
0110_0001_0010_0001 // SHL R1<<R2
0110_0001_0011_0001 // SHL R1<<R3
0110_0010_0000_0001 // SHL R2<<R0
0110_0010_0001_0001 // SHL R2<<R1
0110_0010_0011_0001 // SHL R2<<R3
0110_0011_0000_0001 // SHL R3<<R0
0110_0011_0001_0001 // SHL R3<<R1
0110_0011_0010_0001 // SHL R3<<R2

0111_0000_0001_0001 // MOV R0<<R1
0111_0000_0010_0001 // MOV R0<<R2
0111_0000_0011_0001 // MOV R0<<R3
0111_0001_0000_0001 // MOV R1<<R0
0111_0001_0010_0001 // MOV R1<<R2
0111_0001_0011_0001 // MOV R1<<R3
0111_0010_0000_0001 // MOV R2<<R0
0111_0010_0001_0001 // MOV R2<<R1
0111_0010_0011_0001 // MOV R2<<R3
0111_0011_0000_0001 // MOV R3<<R0
0111_0011_0001_0001 // MOV R3<<R1
0111_0011_0010_0001 // MOV R3<<R2

1000_0000_0000_0101 // LDI R0=8 bit
1000_0001_0000_0101 // LDI R1=8 bit
1000_0010_0000_0101 // LDI R2=8 bit
1000_0011_0000_0101 // LDI R3=8 bit

1110_0000_0000_0011 // JNZ R0,abvline
1110_0001_0000_0011 // JNZ R1,abvline
1110_0010_0000_0011 // JNZ R2,abvline
1110_0011_0000_0011 // JNZ R3,abvline
